docs.lead_paragraph: CNN said Thursday that it would disclose one of its contributors' ties to an insurance industry advocacy group in the future, but did not explain why it had not done so in the past.

headline.main: CNN to Disclose Contributor's Ties to Advocacy Group

docs.abstract: CNN said Thursday that it would disclose one of its contributors' ties to an insurance industry advocacy group in the future.
docs.snippet: CNN said Thursday that it would disclose one of its contributors' ties to an insurance industry advocacy group in the future.

docs.lead_paragraph: Monologue | Aired Wednesday night on "Late Night With Jimmy Fallon" on NBC: Yesterday, the Democrats' health-care bill made it past the Senate Finance Committee, in a 14-9 vote. Sorry if I spoiled the ending for you guys. I know a ... lot of you probably TiVo C-SPAN.
docs.abstract: Monologue | Aired Wednesday night on "Late Night With Jimmy Fallon": Yesterday, the Democrats' healthcare bill made it past the Senate Finance Committee, in a 14-9 vote. Sorry if I spoiled the ending for you guys. I know a local lot of you probably TiVo C-SPAN.
docs.snippet: Monologue | Aired Wednesday night on "Late Night With Jimmy Fallon": Yesterday, the Democrats' healthcare bill made it past the Senate Finance Committee, in a 14-9 vote. Sorry if I spoiled the ending for you guys. I know a local lot of you probably...

docs.lead_paragraph: Now that the Senate Finance Committee has passed a health reform bill, it must now be melded with the variation passed by the Senate Heath, Education, Labor and Pensions Committee. And that amalgamation, should it pass the Senate, will then have to be reconciled with the version that passes the House - itself the product of three separate committees. Much is the same across the three bills, but not the employer mandate.
docs.abstract: The different proposals before Congress would have very different impacts on small businesses.
docs.snippet: The different proposals before Congress would have very different impacts on small businesses.

docs.lead_paragraph: President Obama heads West today for his first visit to New Orleans since he took office. Mr. Obama visited the city five times during his campaign and attacked former President George W. Bush for his response when it was ravaged by Hurricane Katrina in 2005. The stop will be followed by an appearance at a Democratic National Committee fund-raiser in San Francisco tonight.
docs.abstract: A brief stop in New Orleans and a trip to the West Coast are in store for the president, while Congress continues to hash out the details of the health care bills.
docs.snippet: A brief stop in New Orleans and a trip to the West Coast are in store for the president, while Congress continues to hash out the details of the health care bills.

docs.lead_paragraph: The allegations made by a leading industry trade group that the health reform bill would drive up premiums for Americans needs to be addressed head-on.
docs.snippet: The allegations made by a leading industry trade group that the health reform bill would drive up premiums for Americans needs to be addressed head-on.

docs.lead_paragraph: A day after the Senate Finance Committee approved a measure without a “public option,” the question is how the president can reconcile party divisions on the issue.
